entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -18.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 7:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -18.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -22.5°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. High minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
